metadata.title: CVE-2024-46754 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  bpf: Remove tst_run from lwt_seg6local_prog_ops.  The syzbot reported that the lwt_seg6 related BPF ops can be invoked via bpf_test_run() without without entering input_action_end_bpf() first.  Martin KaFai Lau said that self test for BPF_PROG_TYPE_LWT_SEG6LOCAL probably didn't work since it was introduced in commit 04d4b274e2a ("ipv6: sr: Add seg6local action End.BPF"). The reason is that the per-CPU variable seg6_bpf_srh_states::srh is never assigned in the self test case but each BPF function expects it.  Remove test_run for BPF_PROG_TYPE_LWT_SEG6LOCAL.
